name: Magirune
description:
Oh no! You got stuck trying to get the chest. Find the way out.

As a casual dungeon crawler, Magirune is a combination of two games that I really love. This is a port of my first web game and I hope you like it!

After beating the game once, hardcore mode will appear. This is how the game was supposed to be played.

Features:
- 46+ dungeon levels
- Auto save at the start of each level
- Normal mode for casual play with small puzzle
- Hardcore mode for the real dungeon crawler player

W, A, S, D or Arrows: Movement
E: Use potion
The game lacks music but has sound effect.

Walk on enemy to hit them. First time killing an enemy gives 10xp after that it gives 1xp.
